[03] ^b^hemantikenā^eb^ti hemantasamayena. ^b^paṭippassambhantī^eb^ti thirabhāvena parihāyanti. ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha mahāsamuddo viya sāsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, nāvā viya yogāvacaro, nāvāya mahāsamudde pariyāyanaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno ūnapañcavassakāle ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vicaraṇaṃ, nāvāya mahāsamuddaudakena ^a^P4.0064^ea^ khajjamānānaṃ bandhanānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bhikkhuno pabbajjāsaṅkhepena uddesaparipucchādīhiyeva saṃyojanānaṃ tanubhāvo, nāvāya thale ukkhittakālo viya bhikkhuno nissayamuttakassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanakālo, divā vātātapena saṃsussanaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇena taṇhāsinehassa saṃsussanaṃ, rattiṃ himodakena temanaṃ viya kammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya uppannena pītipāmojjena cittatemanaṃ, rattindivaṃ vātātapehi ceva himodakena ca parisukkhaparitintānaṃ bandhanānaṃ dubbalabhāvo viya vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehi saṃyojanānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya dubbalabhāvo, pāvussakamegho viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ, meghavuṭṭhiudakena nāvāya antopūtibhāvo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni laddhā ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa arahattaphalādhigamo. pūtibandhanāya nāvāya kiñci kālaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato mahājanaṃ anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhānaṃ, pūtibandhanāya nāvāya anupubbena bhijjitvā apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamo viya khīṇāsavassa upādinnakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoti imāya upamāya saṃyojanānaṃ dubbalatā dīpitā.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamaṃ ^a^M3.0189^ea^ ^a^P4.0065^ea^ atthuppattiyaṃ kathitaṃ. atthuppatti panassa heṭṭhā cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttavaṇṇanāya (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.51 ādayo) vitthāritā eva. ^b^passatha no^eb^ti passatha nu. ^b^āliṅgitvā^eb^ti upagūhitvā. ^b^upanisīdeyyā^eb^ti samīpe nissāya nisīdeyya. ^b^upanipajjeyyā^eb^ti upagantvā nipajjeyya. ^b^ārocayāmī^eb^ti ācikkhāmi. ^b^paṭivedayāmī^eb^ti paṭivedetvā jānāpetvā kathemi. ^b^vālarajjuyā^eb^ti assavālagovālehi vaṭṭitarajjuyā. ^b^paccorasmi^eb^nti ^a^V3.0189^ea^ uramajjhe. ^b^pheṇuddehaka^eb^nti pheṇaṃ uddehitvā, ussādetvāti attho. ^b^attattha^eb^nti attano diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikalokiyalokuttaraṃ atthaṃ. ^b^paratthobhayatthesu^eb^pi eseva nayo. sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttassa (a0 ni0 1.51 ādayo) atthuppattiyaṃ kathitameva. idañca pana suttaṃ kathetvā satthā cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttaṃ kathesi. navamaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^paritta^eb^nti appaṃ thokaṃ. tañhi sarasaparittatāyapi khaṇaparittatāyapi ṭhitiparittatāyapi parittameva. lahuṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanato ^b^lahukaṃ. mantāyaṃ^eb^ ^a^P4.0066^ea^ ^b^boddhabba^eb^nti mantāya boddhabbaṃ, paññāya jānitabbanti attho. ^b^pabbateyyā^eb^ti pabbatasambhavā. ^b^hārahārinī^eb^ti rukkhanaḷaveḷuādīni haritabbāni harituṃ samatthā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] mahāvaggo sattamo.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamassa paṭhame ^b^āpattiṃ jānātī^eb^ti āpattiṃyeva āpattīti jānāti. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M3.0190^ea^ ^b^svāgatānī^eb^ti suāgatāni suppaguṇāni. ^b^suvibhattānī^eb^ti koṭṭhāsato suṭṭhu vibhattāni ^a^V3.0190^ea^. ^b^suppavattīnī^eb^ti āvajjitāvajjitaṭṭhāne suṭṭhu pavattāni daḷhappaguṇāni. ^b^suvinicchitānī^eb^ti suṭṭhu vinicchitāni. ^b^suttaso^eb^ti vibhaṅgato. ^b^anubyañjanaso^eb^ti khandhakaparivārato.
[03] 77^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotī^eb^ti vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito hoti. ^b^asaṃhīro^eb^ti na sakkā hoti gahitaggahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^eko^eb^ti adutiyo. ^b^vūpakaṭṭho^eb^ti kāyena gaṇato, cittena kilesehi vūpakaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho dūrībhūto. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti ^a^P4.0067^ea^ satiavippavāse ṭhito. ^b^pahitatto^eb^ti pesitatto. ^b^nibbidāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhanatthāya. ^b^virāgāyā^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ virajjanatthāya. ^b^nirodhāyā^eb^ti appavattikaraṇatthāya. ^b^vūpasamāyā^eb^ti kilesavūpasamāya appavattiyā. ^b^abhiññāyā^eb^ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā abhijānanatthāya. ^b^sambodhāyā^eb^ti maggasaṅkhātassa sambodhassa atthāya. ^b^nibbānāyā^eb^ti nibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāya.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ dasame adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamentīti ^b^adhikaraṇasamathā. uppannuppannāna^eb^nti uppannānaṃ uppannānaṃ. ^b^adhikaraṇāna^eb^nti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ. ^b^samathāya vūpasamāyā^eb^ti samathatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca. ^b^sammukhāvinayo dātabbo...pe0... tiṇavatthārako^eb^ti ime satta samathā dātabbā. tesaṃ vinicchayo vinayasaṃvaṇṇanato (cūḷava0 aṭṭha0 186-187 ādayo) gahetabbo. apica dīghanikāye saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyampi ^a^M3.0191^ea^ (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 3.331 adhikaraṇasamathasattakavaṇṇanā) vitthāritoyeva, tathā majjhimanikāye sāmagāmasuttavaṇṇanāyāti (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 3.46).
